title: Gairloch Waterfall Walk Route

description: This walk visits the pretty waterfalls in Flowerdale Glen on the eastern side of Loch Gairloch in Wester Ross. You can start the walk in the public car park in the village and then pick up a pleasant waymarked footpath heading west towards the falls. It's just over a mile to the Easan Bàna waterfall which sits in a scenic and remote location. On the path you will pass the attractive Flowerdale House and enjoy some lovely views of the interesting flora in the glen. To continue your waterfall walking in the area head a few miles east to Loch Maree where you can visit the beautiful Victoria Falls.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: Head north and you could visit the village of Poolewe and enjoy a stroll around the beautiful Inverewe Garden. The lochside gardens are a lovely place for a stroll with some nice footpaths taking you to subtropical plants, fine lawns and beautiful flowers. You can also enjoy fine views over Loch Ewe in this scenic area.

display_address: Sunnyside, A832, Gairloch, Highland, Alba / Scotland, IV21 2BG, United Kingdom
